msbt.message: Toy Day is soon! Of everything about this holiday, I think I'm most excited to exchange presents with everyone.I have so many gift ideas that I don't know what to go with! Except you. Yours is all picked out and wrapped. But don't think that means I expect a lot in return! Whatever you get me is fine, !
Have you started thinking about what to get everyone for Toy Day yet?Whatever it is, you'll want to wrap it nicely. And don't wait until the last minute to do your shopping!
There's a festive tree up in the plaza now! It's really starting to feel like Toy Day season around here.This is one of my favorite times of year, !
